name: swimming_club_site
description: 奈良高専水泳部の公式サイトです！
author: chige12

scripts.dev: rm -r contents/_output_file & processmd contents/news/**/*.md --stdout --outputDir contents/_output_file/news > contents/summary_news.json --markdownOptions.html && processmd contents/results/**/*.md --stdout --outputDir contents/_output_file/results > contents/summary_results.json --markdownOptions.html && nuxt
scripts.generate: rm -r contents/_output_file & processmd contents/news/**/*.md --stdout --outputDir contents/_output_file/news > contents/summary_news.json --markdownOptions.html && processmd contents/results/**/*.md --stdout --outputDir contents/_output_file/results > contents/summary_results.json --markdownOptions.html && nuxt generate
